Instructions.Value: The Shamash reconnaissance vehicle began production by Clan Blood Spirit in the late 29th century following the declining fortunes of that Clan as a smaller, faster cheaper replacement for the Asshur. Hover: Fast on open ground and water, slow in rough terrain, not very agile, cannot move through woods. Movement: 13/20 Hex: 390/600 Meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous (C) Structure: Structure Values A S Front 45 10 Left 35 10 Right 35 10 Rear 35 10 Turret 40 10 Total 190 50
